polls.title: Today Poll
polls.description: Quick quick vote for matter wey dey ground

polls.techTransparency: You think say make big tech companies dey show how dem dey take make decisions to make people trust dem?
polls.disasterRelief: Make we create special money wey go dey ready to help when big disaster like earthquake happen?
polls.aiWatermarking: Make we force people to put mark for AI content so e go hard to use am deceive people for election?
polls.biotech: Make we get rules wey go control how dem dey use new biotech make e safe?
polls.spaceMilitarization: Make world leaders agree say nobody go carry fight enter space?
polls.dataSovereignty: Make we get rules wey go protect everybody data for world?
polls.fourDayWeek: You support make people dey work four days for week instead of five?
polls.nuclearSecurity: Make we get strong rules to protect nuclear places when war dey?
polls.aviationResilience: You think say our air travel system fit handle big wahala if e happen?
polls.waterResources: Make countries join hand manage water well as e dey scarce?
polls.maternalHealth: Make we keep special money for mama and pikin health when other help no dey come?
polls.marsMission: You support make countries join hand go Mars?
polls.globalRecession: You think say de way money matter be now fit cause big wahala for world economy?
polls.aidCorridors: Make we dey automatically send help when civilians dey suffer for war area?
polls.nationalSovereignty: You support make countries still get power but still dey work together for big problems?
polls.climateDisasters: Make countries wey disaster like fire or flood catch get quick money from climate fund?
polls.aiSafety: Make we tell AI developers make dem stop to build stronger AI until we get safety rules?
polls.corporateTax: Make big companies wey dey work for many countries pay same minimum tax to reduce inequality?
polls.spaceDebris: You agree say make dem force countries and companies to remove their old satellites from space?
polls.digitalPrivacy: You think say we need strong privacy rules for everybody for this digital world?
polls.nuclearProliferation: You believe say the way we dey control nuclear weapons now dey work well?
polls.cybersecurity: The way we dey protect important computer systems now strong enough?
polls.globalAlliances: You think say the way countries dey change who dem be friend with go make world better?
polls.climateResilience: We dey handle climate wahala well as e dey worse every time?
polls.tradeTariffs: You think say the way big countries dey put tax for goods go spoil world trade?
polls.diseaseManagement: You trust say world fit handle new sickness if e come?
polls.aiRegulation: Make we get strong rules for how dem dey develop AI?
polls.spaceRegulation: Make we get rules wey go control how much trash dey for space?
polls.diplomaticDialogue: You believe say if world leaders dey talk well well, e go reduce tension?
polls.migration: Make rich countries collect more people wey dey run from war or climate wahala?
polls.rareEarths: Make countries join hand work together for rare minerals matter?
polls.cryptocurrency: Make we get same rules everywhere for cryptocurrency to stop bad things?
polls.disinformation: Make we get rules to stop fake news for internet?
polls.diseaseOutbreaks: Make countries dey share information quick quick when sickness start?
polls.militaryIntervention: Make countries wey get strong military dey enter stop war for other places?
polls.aiDevelopment: Make government control AI development well well even if e go slow things down?
polls.asteroidDefense: You believe say make government put more money for space watching and asteroid protection?
polls.peaceNegotiations: Make dem force big countries to put small countries wey war affect for peace talk?
polls.taiwanPolicy: Make America continue their policy wey no too clear for Taiwan matter to avoid China wahala?
polls.quakeCodes: Make dem standardize di global building codes make city infrastructure fit handle earthquake better?

appPurpose.question: Wetin be World Republic?
appPurpose.answer: World Republic na open, democratic organization wey dey work to solve big big problems wey affect everybody for world. E dey help make everybody fit join hand take decision for matter wey need everybody for world to solve am, like AI wahala, climate change, or how to make sure say new science no go wound us.

basicIncome.question: Wetin be Basic Income?
basicIncome.answer: Our Basic Income na 1 WDD (world drachma) wey we dey give every citizen of World Republic every day. E dey add up as time dey go and you fit collect am anytime through de app.

basicIncomePlus.question: How I go take start Basic Income Plus?
basicIncomePlus.answer: Basic Income Plus dey give extra 10 WDD every day, but na only people wey don do Orb verification fit get am. After you don start normal Basic Income, you go see option to start Basic Income Plus for de Earn page.

savings.question: How de Savings Account dey work?
savings.answer: De Savings Account dey let you keep your WDD tokens and get 69% interest every year. If you dey collect and put back de interest wey you don get, you fit get close to 100% returns for year, wey go make your WDD grow well well. Interest dey add up every time and you fit collect am or put am back anytime.

referralCodes.question: How referral codes dey work?
referralCodes.answer: As World Republic citizen, you fit earn money when you bring people join. Share your special invite link with your friends, and you go get 50 WDD for each person wey join and start Basic Income Plus. You never see your money? Make your friend click 'Give Person Wey Invite You Money' for their referral section.

drachmaValue.question: Where drachma dey get im value from?
drachmaValue.answer: Drachma get value because na de official money for World Republic. As our democratic platform dey grow, WDD fit become important money wey people go dey use for world economy, and e fit help make sure say everybody dey benefit from new technology and world resources.

topWallets.question: Who dey control de biggest accounts?
topWallets.answer: De three biggest accounts na de World Republic Treasury, de Basic Income Fund, and de Basic Income Plus Fund. For now, na de person wey start de project dey control am, but we go give de control to everybody after we don agree on our constitution. Other important addresses na de Savings Account contract, de Referral Rewards distributor, and liquidity pools: WLD/WDD, USDC/WDD, and ETH/WDD.

voteRequirements.question: Wetin person need before e fit start vote?
voteRequirements.answer: De polls and open letters wey dey now na just example. Our community go decide how we go dey govern ourselves when we don elect World Assembly for Q2 2025.
